Description: Plaque; plaster; shield-shaped; set with glass; a large round piece in the centre with seven pieces surrounding it, of various shapes and colours; at the bottom a glass cross patée with circular holes between each terminal; a groove all around the edge.
Curator's comments: Parallels: E. Dauterman Maguire et al., Art and Holy Powers in the Early Christian House (Urbana IL 1989) cat. 137; V. Arveiller-Dulong & M.-D. Nenna, Les verres antiques du Musée du Louvre, vol. 3 (Paris 2011) cat. 505-7.
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
